com.scottescue.dropwizard.entitymanager

Interface PersistenceUnitConfig


  • public interface PersistenceUnitConfig
    Provides a means to configure the persistence unit before it is created.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PersistenceUnitConfig addJarFileUrls(URL url, URL... urls)
      Specifies URLs for any jar files or exploded jar file directories that the persistence provider must examine for managed classes of the persistence unit.
      PersistenceUnitConfig addMappingFileNames(String fileName, String... fileNames)
      Specifies any mapping files that must be loaded to determine the mappings for the entity classes.
      PersistenceUnitConfig setExcludeUnlistedClasses(boolean excludeUnlistedClasses)
      Specifies whether classes in the root of the persistence unit that have not been explicitly listed are to be included in the set of managed classes.
      PersistenceUnitConfig setProperty(String property, String value)
      Specifies a property value to be used by the persistence provider for the persistence unit.
      PersistenceUnitConfig setSharedCacheMode(javax.persistence.SharedCacheMode sharedCacheMode)
      Specifies how the provider must use a second-level cache for the persistence unit.
      PersistenceUnitConfig setValidationMode(javax.persistence.ValidationMode validationMode)
      Specifies the validation mode to be used by the persistence provider for the persistence unit.

    • Method Detail

      • setExcludeUnlistedClasses

        PersistenceUnitConfig setExcludeUnlistedClasses(boolean excludeUnlistedClasses)
        Specifies whether classes in the root of the persistence unit that have not been explicitly listed are to be included in the set of managed classes. Classes that have not been explicitly listed are excluded by default.
        Parameters:
        excludeUnlistedClasses - whether classes in the root of the persistence unit that have not been explicitly listed are to be included in the set of managed classes
        Returns:
        a reference to this object

      • setSharedCacheMode

        PersistenceUnitConfig setSharedCacheMode(javax.persistence.SharedCacheMode sharedCacheMode)
        Specifies how the provider must use a second-level cache for the persistence unit. SharedCacheMode.UNSPECIFIED is used by default.
        Parameters:
        sharedCacheMode - the second-level cache mode that must be used by the provider for the persistence unit
        Returns:
        a reference to this object

      • setValidationMode

        PersistenceUnitConfig setValidationMode(javax.persistence.ValidationMode validationMode)
        Specifies the validation mode to be used by the persistence provider for the persistence unit. ValidationMode.AUTO is used by default.
        Parameters:
        validationMode - the validation mode to be used by the persistence provider for the persistence unit
        Returns:
        a reference to this object

      • addMappingFileNames

        PersistenceUnitConfig addMappingFileNames(String fileName,
                                          String... fileNames)
        Specifies any mapping files that must be loaded to determine the mappings for the entity classes. The mapping files must be in the standard XML mapping format, be uniquely named and be resource-loadable from the application classpath. There are no mapping files used by default.
        Parameters:
        fileName - mapping file name that the persistence provider must load to determine the mappings for the entity classes
        fileNames - list of any additional mapping file names that the persistence provider must load to determine the mappings for the entity classes
        Returns:
        a reference to this object

      • addJarFileUrls

        PersistenceUnitConfig addJarFileUrls(URL url,
                                     URL... urls)
        Specifies URLs for any jar files or exploded jar file directories that the persistence provider must examine for managed classes of the persistence unit. A URL will either be a file: URL referring to a jar file or referring to a directory that contains an exploded jar file, or some other URL from which an InputStream in jar format can be obtained.
        Parameters:
        url - URL object referring to a jar file or directory
        urls - list of any additional URL objects referring to jar files or directories
        Returns:
        a reference to this object

      • setProperty

        PersistenceUnitConfig setProperty(String property,
                                  String value)
        Specifies a property value to be used by the persistence provider for the persistence unit.
        Parameters:
        property - property name
        value - the value to be used by the persistence provider for the persistence unit
        Returns:
        a reference to this object
